description: This scholarship was established by the family of Brock Warren in his memory. It recognizes Professional Media students who are active in student media, with an interest in political reporting.? Eligibility Requirements Professional Media major Full-time student Minimum 2.5 GPA Preference is given to Professional Media students who are active in student media with an interest in political reporting and a love of writing Write a one-page essay demonstrating your fit for the scholarship Financial need will be a consideration

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
